sentences.en: "Getting nowhere fast," pronounced Crosby, "that's what we're doing."
sentences.cn: 克罗斯比断言说：“我们一无所获，在做无用功。”

sentences.en: a fast car
sentences.cn: 速度很快的汽车

sentences.en: a fast-moving river
sentences.cn: 湍急的河流

sentences.en: Fast work by the police in Birmingham had started producing circumstantial evidence.
sentences.cn: 快速开展工作的伯明翰警方已经开始发现间接证据。

sentences.en: he had been trying to &B{pull a fast one on} his co-producer.
sentences.cn: 他一直在设法占他的合伙制片人的便宜。

sentences.en: He’s one of the fastest runners in the world.
sentences.cn: 他是世界上跑得最快的人之一。

sentences.en: I fasted for a day and a half and asked God to help me.
sentences.cn: 我禁食了一天半，请求上帝帮助我。

sentences.en: I was a little breathless and my heartbeat was bumpy and fast.
sentences.cn: 我有点儿喘不上气，心脏咚咚地快速跳动着。

sentences.en: In 1987, McDonald's captured 19 percent of all fast-food sales.
sentences.cn: 1987年，麦当劳占据了整个快餐业销售额的19%。

sentences.en: Johnny ran off as fast as his legs could carry him (= running as quickly as he could ) .
sentences.cn: 约翰尼飞也似的跑开了。

sentences.en: Megamalls and fast food restaurants line the highway system.
sentences.cn: 公路系统沿线有大型商场和快餐店。

sentences.en: On the morning before starting the fast, write down your starting weight.
sentences.cn: 早晨开始禁食前，记下你的体重。

sentences.en: Sean's a fast thinker, and he acts on impulse.
sentences.cn: 肖恩是个思维敏捷、行事随兴的人。

sentences.en: She climbed the staircase cautiously, holding fast to the rail.
sentences.cn: 她紧紧地抓着栏杆，小心翼翼地爬楼梯。

sentences.en: Slow down – you’re driving too fast.
sentences.cn: 慢点——你开得太快了。

sentences.en: Successfully merging two banks requires a fast and ruthless attack on costs.
sentences.cn: 成功合并两家银行需要坚决快速地着手解决费用问题。

sentences.en: That can’t be the time - my watch must be fast.
sentences.cn: 不可能是这个时间——一定是我的表快了。

sentences.en: The band was starting to play a fast, loud number.
sentences.cn: 乐队奏起一首很大声的快歌。

sentences.en: The current of the river is fast flowing and treacherous.
sentences.cn: 这条河水流湍急，变幻莫测。

sentences.en: The tears were streaming so fast she could not see.
sentences.cn: 眼泪哗哗地流下来，她的视线一下子就模糊了。

sentences.en: There is a feeling of power that comes from driving fast.
sentences.cn: 开快车会让人觉得自己有一种主宰之力。

sentences.en: This war had to be fought fast and relatively bloodlessly.
sentences.cn: 这场战争必须速战速决，尽量兵不血刃。

sentences.en: Word has been spreading fast of the incidents on the streets.
sentences.cn: 有关街头骚乱的消息迅速传播开来。

words.tran_cn: 牢固；不褪色；要塞；巩固；堡垒；迅速
使固定；集中于；扎牢；强加于
[摄]快速的，迅速的；紧的，稳固的

phrases.tran_cn: 夏令时间；日光节约时间（daylight-saving time）

trans.tran_cn: 快的，迅速的，头脑灵活的，系牢的，不掉色的
trans.tran_en: moving or able to move quickly
a period during which someone does not eat, especially for religious reasons
If you fast, you eat no food for a period of time, usually for either religious or medical reasons, or as a protest
moving or able to move quickly
